rationale: The intensifier 'extremely' modifies 'large', not a risk-adjective.
statement_text: So far more than 600,000 chickens and turkeys have been affected in Minnesota. It’s [the Minnesota poultry industry] an extremely large industry.
So far more than 600,000 chickens and turkeys have been affected in Minnesota. It’s [the Minnesota poultry industry] an extremely large industry.
